en.description: Hi, I’m Trent — a data engineer who loves solving messy data problems and turning them into clean, usable systems. At Fifth Third Bank, I’ve helped modernize the Mortgage Data department by building cloud-based pipelines using tools like dbt, Snowflake, and Python. Before that, I worked as a full-stack developer, which taught me to think about both the data and the people using it. Outside of work, I serve on the board of the Hook-A-Heart Foundation, where I lead all things tech to help grow our mission and events. Whether I’m building something for a team, a business, or a cause — I’m all about making data work smarter.

es.description: Soy diseñador UX desde hace 8 años, creando interfaces amigables que se sienten naturales, intuitivas y fluidas en diferentes dispositivos. Me apasiona diseñar experiencias digitales que no solo se vean bien, sino que también funcionen sin esfuerzo, haciendo que las interacciones sean más suaves y agradables.

en.description: Thanks for stopping by — feel free to explore my projects, check out my experience, or just say hello!
